FuncDef: This command defines the number of the Event Notification OAM PDU to be send to the peer if the local signal failure threshold (sf-threshold) has been reached. The sending of the Event Notification OAMPDU is configured under the individual monitors.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the number of Event Notification OAM PDUs to send to a peer when the signal failure threshold has been reached. Values-1 to 5.
